TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ru_ja_qas, title = Ru_ja_qas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ru_ja_qas} }

S.FORM: Ru ja qas Itiniay i Dawu Cen no Taitung ko Ru ja qas a niyaro', 247 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 588 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 62% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 362 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 38% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 226 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan56%, Amis3%, Tayal1%, roma1%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

Ro ja qas Itiniay i Dawo Cen no Taitong ko Ro ja qas a niyaro', 247 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 588 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 62% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 362 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 38% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 226 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan56%, Amis3%, Tayal1%, roma1%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
